00022 #include "Stream.h"
00023 
00024 /// \brief
00025 /// GisIoFileStream provides streamed I/O on a disk file.
00026 class GisIoFileStream :
00027     public GisIoStream
00028 {
00029 public:
00030     /// \brief
00031     /// creates the stream for a named file.
00032     /// 
00033     /// \param fileName 
00034     /// Input the file name
00035     /// \param accessModes 
00036     /// Input File access modes. Same as the fopen() C run-time library function
00037     /// (mode parameter).
00038     /// 
00039     /// \return
00040     /// Returns the created file stream.
00041     /// 
00042     static GIS_API GisIoFileStream* Create(GisString* fileName, GisString* accessModes );
00043 
00044     /// \brief
00045     /// creates the stream around a C Runtime file stream.
00046     /// 
00047     /// \param fp 
00048     /// Input the file stream pointer.
00049     /// 
00050     /// \return
00051     /// Returns the created file stream.
00052     /// 
00053     GIS_API static GisIoFileStream* Create(FILE* fp);
00054 
00055     GIS_API virtual GisSize Read( GisByte* buffer, GisSize count );
00056     GIS_API virtual void Write( GisByte* buffer, GisSize count );
00057     GIS_API virtual void Write( GisIoStream* stream, GisSize count = 0 );
00058     GIS_API virtual void SetLength( GisInt64 length );
00059     GIS_API virtual GisInt64 GetLength();
00060     GIS_API virtual GisInt64 GetIndex();
00061     GIS_API virtual void Skip( GisInt64 offset );
00062     GIS_API virtual void Reset();
00063 
00064     GIS_API virtual GisBoolean CanRead();
00065     GIS_API virtual GisBoolean CanWrite();
00066     GIS_API virtual GisBoolean HasContext();
00067 
00068 protected:
00069 /// \cond DOXYGEN-IGNORE
00070     /// Default constructor to satisfy Linux
00071     GisIoFileStream() {}
00072     GisIoFileStream(GisString* fileName, GisString* accessModes );
00073     GisIoFileStream(FILE* fp);
00074     virtual ~GisIoFileStream(void);
00075 
00076     int GetFd()
00077     {
00078         return mFd;
00079     }
00080 
00081     /// Sets up the canRead and canWrite flags.
00082     void InitFileStatus();
00083 
00084     /// Throw exception if this stream has no context.
00085     /// Context is lost when the file size exceeds MAX_LONG.
00086     void CheckContext( GisString* caller );
00087 
00088     /// Buffer size for writing from another stream.
00089     static const size_t mBufferSize = 1024;
00090 /// \endcond
00091 
00092 private:
00093     FILE*         mFp;
00094     int           mFd;
00095     GisBoolean    mbMyFp;
00096     GisBoolean    mbCanRead;
00097     GisBoolean    mbCanWrite;
00098     GisBoolean    mbHasContext;
00099     GisBoolean    mbTextMode;
00100 };
00101 
00102 /// \brief
00103 /// GisIoFileStreamP is a GisPtr on GisIoFileStream, provided for convenience.
00104 typedef GisPtr<GisIoFileStream> GisIoFileStreamP;

00106 #endif
